author: olegk
msg: - HttpMethodCloner contributed by Thomas Mathis. This utility can be used to create exact copies of objects that implement HttpMethod interface

- EasySSLProtocolSocketFactory & EasyX509TrustManager contributed by Adrian Sutton & Oleg Kalnichevski. EasySSLProtocolSocketFactory can be used to create SSL sockets that accept self-signed certificates when communicating with HTTP servers over SSL

author: olegk
msg: FilePart#sendData method made more protective by using try {} finally {} when reading from the input stream

author: olegk
msg: - 'expect: 100-continue' handshake disabled per default, as it may not work properly with older (HTTP/1.0) HTTP servers or proxies (Squid-2.4.STABLE7 for instance)
- Wire logging fixed for Connect method

author: olegk
msg: - Path is no more url-encoded in HttpMethodBase#generateRequestLine()
